title: GDG Los Angeles DevFest 2015 Summary
brief: GDG Los Angeles DevFest 2015 is now over. It was a great success. We are happy to share with you some facts, emotions and, of course, photos from the biggest Google Developers Conference in Southern California!

title: GDG Los Angeles DevFest 2016 Announced
brief: Southern California Google Developers Groups are proud to announce the second annual GDG Los Angeles DevFest which is the biggest Google related event in Southern California carefully crafted by GDG Los Angeles! The event will take place on the **4th of December** in **Los Angeles**.

title: Call for Papers Time
brief: GDG Los Angeles DevFest 2016 announced! The 2nd edition of the biggest conference about Google technologies in Southern California will take on **December 4th** in Los Angeles. That means that it is time to open [call for talk submissions](http://goo.gl/TRhW3V).
